alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:59AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers above 3000 feet. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3000 feet near Camp Verde, Chino Valley, Congress, Cottonwood, Paulden and Prescott Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 6 AM Today: Camp Verde 0 inches Chino Valley 0 inches Congress 0 inches Cottonwood 0 inches Paulden 0 inches Prescott Valley 0 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
